name: Morning Brief
description: Daily priorities briefing covering labor, applications, and risks delivered in ≤5 minutes.

prd.problemStatement: Superintendents need a quick way to understand daily priorities across labor, applications, and risks without manually reviewing multiple systems or reports.
goals: Provide comprehensive daily overview in ≤5 minutes
Surface critical labor assignments and availability
Highlight application windows and weather triggers
Flag risks and potential issues requiring attention
userStories: As a superintendent, I want to receive a morning brief so that I understand my daily priorities quickly
As a superintendent, I want to see labor assignments in my brief so that I can identify any gaps
As a superintendent, I want weather-triggered application windows highlighted so that I don't miss optimal timing
As a superintendent, I want risk alerts in my brief so that I can address issues proactively
dependencies: Labor scheduling system must be implemented
Application triggers engine must be operational
